mapper.select: select * from mod_missionstate s left outer join mod_missioninfo i on s.mission_info_id = i.mission_info_id left outer join mod_missioncategory c on c.mission_category_id = i.mission_category_id where s.user_nickname = #{nickname}
select * from mod_notes n left outer join mod_users u on n.sent_nickname=u.user_nickname where received_nickname=#{user_nickname} order by n.send_date desc
select * from mod_notes where sent_nickname = #{user_nickname} order by send_date desc
select profile_picture from mod_users where user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
mapper.insert: insert into mod_notes(notes_id, received_nickname, sent_nickname, notes_contents) values('notes'||lpad(seq_notes.nextval,5,0), #{received_nickname}, #{sent_nickname}, #{notes_contents})
mapper.update: update mod_users set user_nickname=#{user_nickname},user_passwd=#{user_passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job=#{job, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location=#{location, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_of_birth= #{date_of_birth} where kakao_id=#{kakao_id}
mapper.select: select s.*, c.*, i.mission_title, i.mission_level, i.mission_contents, i.mission_location from mod_missionstate s left outer join mod_missioninfo i on s.mission_info_id=i.mission_info_id left outer join mod_missioncategory c on i.mission_category_id=c.mission_category_id where s.mission_state_id=#{mission_state_id}
